title: Disco Sucks - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/11/20
itunes:title: Disco Sucks - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/11/20
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and music historian Harvey Kubernik discuss the end of the disco music era and its biggest band the Bee Gees with the "Disco Demolition Night" event at a Chicago White Sox game in July 1979 with Danny Falato, a radio station employee who was at the event.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Guest host Ian Punnett and music historian Harvey Kubernik discuss the end of the disco music era and its biggest band the Bee Gees with the "Disco Demolition Night" event at a Chicago White Sox game in July 1979 with Danny Falato, a radio station employee who was at the event.

itunes:summary: An exploration into the end of the disco music era with an ill fated publicity stunt.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
